inra.ijpb.data.image

Class ByteStackWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • inra.ijpb.data.image.ByteStackWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Image3D

    public class ByteStackWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Image3D
    Access the data of a 3D image containing gray8 values stored as bytes.

    Example of use: 

    ImageStack stack = IJ.getImage().getStack();
	Image3D image = new ByteStackWrapper(stack);
	int val = image.get(0, 0, 0);
    Author:
    David Legland
    See Also:
    ShortStackWrapper, FloatStackWrapper
